amendment.description: To extend the duration of the immigrant investor regional center pilot program for 5 additional years, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2170 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2170 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S14505-14506; text: CR S14505) To extend the duration of the immigrant investor regional center pilot program for 5 additional years, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2170 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2170 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
